An Indianapolis postal worker describes the procedure for tornado victims on the Eastside of Indianapolis.

video.title: Peace in the Streets Rally

caption.p: There's nothing like a crisis to bring all parts of a community together. See how community leaders and neighbors respond during this rally to ensure peace in an Indianapolis Eastside community ravaged by storms.

video.title: DPW Installs 90 New Signs
video.caption: The Indianapolis Department of Public Works installs 90 new street and traffic signs in an Eastside community, to improve the quality of life for all, following spring storms. Watch as workers surprise some busy bees who did not STOP building THEIR home despite the warning sign.

video.title: Peace in the Streets Rally 2

caption.p: Believe in the possibilities of a better community. That is the promise these community leaders and neighbors put forth as they rally an Eastside Indianapolis neighborhood to stamp out drugs and violence.

video.title: Indiana Project Aftermath-A little girl remembers June 2008
